QuestData.Title: Desperate Measures
QuestData.Description: We've identified the location of Teron'gor's compound, but his forces are already far stronger than anything we've ever faced. We need to gain an edge, and quickly.$B$BThe cursed spirits of the Ango'rosh ogres, our ancient enemies, linger in nearby ruins. Go there and gather the Ango'rosh Spellbook and the Grimoire of Binding.$B$BPerform the ritual described within at their altar to lift their curse and seek their aid.$B$BIt's a long shot, but we don't have any other options.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather the Ango'rosh Spellbook and the Grimoire of Binding, then perform the ritual at the Altar of Ango'rosh in the Ango'rosh Ruins.
QuestData.CompletionText: Were you able to acquire the aid of the Ango'rosh?
QuestData.RewardText: You radiate the power of the Ango'rosh!$B$B<Restalaan smiles.>$B$BIt is time to take this battle to Teron'gor's doorstep.
